itemInfo.itemDesc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Grinding Rough Diamonds.

item.name: Rough Diamond
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing. Rough Diamond requires a certain level of skill to collect.\n- How to Obtain: It can be directly obtained from rock containing Gemstones.

item.name: Yuria Necklace
item.desc: A necklace possessed with a hatred for Humankind.\nIt can be Enhanced with the same type of necklace, but if Enhancement fails, both will be lost.

item.name: Yuria Earring
item.desc: An earring possessed with a hatred for Humankind.\nIt can be Enhanced with the same type of earring, but if Enhancement fails, both will be lost.

item.name: Yuria Ring
item.desc: A ring possessed with a hatred for Humankind.\nIt can be Enhanced with the same type of ring, but if Enhancement fails, both will be lost.

item.name: Yuria Belt
item.desc: A belt possessed with a hatred for Humankind.\nIt can be Enhanced with the same type of belt, but if Enhancement fails, both will be lost.

item.name: Star Diamond Necklace
item.desc: A necklace decorated with a Star Diamond.

item.name: Resplendent Diamond Necklace
item.desc: A necklace decorated with a Resplendent Diamond.

item.name: Resplendent Diamond
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Grinding a Rough Diamond. It requires the knowledge of Grinding: Beginner.

※ Find Ornella in Heidel and complete the Materials for Equipment Repair Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.
